Marvin

Marvin is a simple PHP framework for building web applications.

It is designed to be simple and easy to use, and to provide a solid foundation for building web applications.

Marvin is built on top of the Slim Framework, and provides a number of additional features to make building web applications easier.

Marvin is designed to be easy to use, and to provide a solid foundation for building web applications.
